However, trust in a psychic often involves believing in their ability to access information beyond normal means. If the psychic admits to hot reading, they're essentially saying they don't have such abilities, which might make some clients question the value of the session. So, weighing these factors, the honesty is good, but the method itself might undermine the trust in the psychic's abilities.
